### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    sensor_type TEXT,
    reading FLOAT
);


CREATE TABLE energy_optimization (
    optimization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_name TEXT,
    optimization_type TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    efficiency_score FLOAT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE sensor_data SET location = 'Room A' WHERE sensor_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  power_consumed FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE RoomInfo (
  room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_name VARCHAR(50),
  total_power_consumed FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SensorLocations (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT,
  floor_number INT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyPatterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern_name VARCHAR(50),
  analysis_result TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE SensorData SET sensor_type = 'Temperature' WHERE id = 1;

  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,

)

  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,

  power_consumed FLOAT
)

)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE RoomInfo SET total_power_consumed = total_power_consumed + (SELECT SUM(power_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM SensorLocations WHERE room_id = 1)) WHERE room_id = 1
